postTitle: Graffiti Cleaned Off Spooner St Bus Stop
postText: The graffiti on Spooner St bus stop has been cleaned off.

Hey neighbors, we are throwing a party on the 16th Feb and wanted to let you know that there might be a few more cars parked around Angus Street and surrounds. We will be keeping the noise to a minimum and guests know to keep quiet when leaving! Text me if you have any issues at 040404040401.

comments.commentText: No worries! We appreciate the heads up! Enjoy!!!

postText: Selling our 2-year-old TV as we have just updated our whole system. It is an LG 3000 and is in great working order. Feel free to come and see for yourself.
Reminder: Community meeting tonight at the local community center to discuss upcoming roadworks.
